          Live out your cop and criminal fantasy in Battlefield Hardline. 
  This action-packed blockbuster combines intense signature 
  multiplayer moments of Battlefield with an emotionally charged 
  story and setting reminiscent of a modern television crime drama.

          In a visceral single-player campaign you'll play the role of Nick
  Mendoza, a young detective who embarks on a cross-country vendetta
  seeking revenge against once trusted partners on the force.

          Instructions:

          -Burn or mount the image
          -Install the game
          -Copy the crack to your game dir
          -Enjoy

          Notes:

    into CPY.ini
